name: Contact Activity Timeline
description: Chronological timeline of all interactions and activities with a contact.

prd.problemStatement: Team members cannot easily see the complete history of interactions with a contact, making it difficult to maintain context in conversations and coordinate team efforts effectively.
goals: Display all contact interactions in chronological order
Provide quick context for upcoming conversations
Enable team coordination through shared activity visibility

successMetrics.target: Reduce from 10 minutes to under 3 minutes
70% of users check timeline before contact interactions

inScope: Display emails, calls, meetings in timeline

userStories: As a sales rep, I want to see all past interactions with a contact so that I can prepare for our next conversation
dependencies: Activity logging service must be available
